projects.name: Vedas - An Ed-Tech Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented the Full-Stack Ed-Tech Platform. Developed a modular e-learning platform with 3 distinct user roles (Student, Instructor, Admin), each equipped with specific functionalities. Implemented a client-server architecture, with the front end serving as the client and the back end and database serving as the server. Established a secure user authentication system implementing Email Verification, JWT (Json Web Token), and robust Password Hashing for optimal data protection.

projects.name: Variants.AI
projects.description: Designed and built a Full Stack Software as a Service AI Platform enabling interactive conversations with notable personas like Jeff Bezos (founder of Amazon), Steve Jobs (founder of Apple). Established account creation and management functionalities for 2 account types: Basic and Pro. Enabled users to seamlessly manage their accounts through Stripes deposit and withdrawal functionalities, achieving a 100% success rate.

experiences.description: Built and delivered 3+ client websites, prioritizing exceptional user experiences and achieving high client satisfaction. Demonstrated expertise in server configuration and optimization to deploy 3+ client applications onto VPS platforms, ensuring smooth live hosting. Optimized website performance using React, resulting in a 20% reduction in load times and a 15% increase in user engagement.

experiences.company_name: Real Capital Ventures, Espacios Design Studio
experiences.description: Administered the development of a full-Stack project, completing it within 2 months. Crafted a user-friendly blog web app and Zetpeak portfolio with all essential features and 8+ web pages. Integrated user authentication, search functionality, and the Like Comment system to rank the posts. Managed the database and created a responsive front-end using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Delivered clear, step-by-step explanations and guidance to enhance students understanding of concepts. Leveraged strong communication and active listening skills to achieve a 78% positive rating from students.
